resolution_hint: Select a different garment or wait for the current cycle to complete

resolution_hint: Check existing cycles for this user before creating new ones

resolution_hint: Review the allowed state transitions in the documentation

error_message: User must be in Active state to commit cycle
resolution_hint: Resolve any holds on the user account first

error_message: Garment has exceeded its lifecycle limit
resolution_hint: This garment should be retired and removed from circulation

error_message: Packing variance must be resolved before shipping
resolution_hint: Either correct the pack to match plan or commit to observed contents

error_message: Garment condition grade is too low for allocation
resolution_hint: Send garment for repair or retire it

resolution_hint: Contact user to update payment method

error_message: Cannot cancel cycle after commitment
